content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

###Iron Smelting Area at position(0,0)
Consists of two furnaces:
- Stone furnace at (0.0, 0.0) with coal fuel and iron plate output
- Stone furnace at (2.0, 0.0) with coal fuel and iron plate output

###Copper Smelting Area at position(4,4)
Consists of two furnaces:
- Stone furnace at (4.0, 4.0) with coal fuel and copper plate output
- Stone furnace at (6.0, 4.0) with coal fuel and copper plate output

###Inserter Assembly Line at position(23.5, 2.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine 1 at (23.5, 2.5) configured to craft inserters
- Input wooden chest at (20.5, 2.5)
- Output wooden chest at (26.5, 2.5)
- Two burner inserters at (21.5, 2.5) and (25.5, 2.5) to feed and extract from assembler

###Power Generation System
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 24.5) producing water
- Boiler at (-2.5, 24.0) converting water to steam
- Steam engine at (4.5, 24.5) generating power
- Two pipe networks:
  - Water pipes connecting pump to boiler (system 9314)
  - Steam pipes connecting boiler to engine (system 9316)
- Electric pole network connecting power to facilities

ERROR TIPS

###Inventory Management Errors
- Ensure required materials are in inventory before attempting crafting or insertion operations
- Check inventory has sufficient coal before attempting to fuel machines
- Verify presence of required components (iron plates, electronic circuits etc.) before assembly operations

###Entity Placement Errors
- Check target location is clear before placing new entities
- Remove existing entities if trying to place in an occupied position

###Power System Issues
- Ensure boiler has sufficient fuel to maintain steam production
- Verify power pole connections are properly established between power source and consumers

###Resource Flow Issues
- Monitor and maintain input resources for furnaces to prevent "no ingredients" state
- Keep assembly machines supplied with required components through input chests

###Crafting Errors
- Ensure all prerequisite materials are available before attempting to craft items
- Some items like iron plates require furnace smelting and cannot be hand crafted
